texts.socialHeroHeader: Human and Environmental Impact through Social Enterprise
texts.businessContent: With a young dynamic population that is eager to contribute to the global economy, East Africa has a lot to offer to the world. Now is the time to nurture sustainable, inclusive and scalable business. The rest will take care of itself.

texts.aboutUsHeroText: HOW TO RECOGNIZE AN ELEWA MEMBER
texts.aboutUsHeroHeader: Dependable, Creative, Supportive, Open Minded and Fun*
